scripts.cypress:report: npm run cypress:clean-reports && npm run cypress:run -- --headless --browser electron && npm run cypress:merge-reports
scripts.cypress:clean-reports: rm -rf cypress/results/* || true && rm -rf cypress/reports/* || true
scripts.cypress:merge-reports: mochawesome-merge cypress/results/*.json > cypress/results/mochawesome-combined.json && npx marge cypress/results/mochawesome-combined.json --reportDir cypress/reports --inline
